title: Petition to Stop Proposed Crypto Ban in US Gains Traction
description: A petition to stop a proposed crypto ban in the U.S. has gained traction. The Chamber of Digital Commerce explained that the Digital Asset Anti Money Laundering Act, introduced by Senator Elizabeth Warren and currently supported by 19 U.S. senators, is “a crypto ban” that “threatens to stifle innovation, harm job prospects, and undermine the […]

title: Yellow Card exchange leads the way in Nigeria’s crypto revival
description: In a significant development for the crypto industry in Nigeria, the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has reversed its stance on cryptocurrency, allowing banks to facilitate transactions for this digital asset class. This move marks a pivotal moment, paving the way for crypto trading platforms, including the Pan-African giant Yellow Card Exchange, to explore licensing […]

title: SEC Commissioner calls out colleagues for ‘imprecise legal reasoning’
description: SEC commissioner Hester Peirce clapped back at her own colleagues for imposing a $1.7 million fine on defi protocol BarnBridge DAO.
